name: Luxury Self Contained
description: Welcome to this stunning luxury self-contained apartment, perfectly situated in the serene environment of Ojoo, Ibadan.
This beautiful abode offers a tranquil retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life, while still providing easy access to all the amenities you need.
The apartment boasts a well-maintained and secure environment, complete with air conditioning and a water heater for your comfort.
Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a convenient base for exploring Ibadan, this luxury self-contained apartment has everything you need.

name: Modern Office Space
description: Are you looking for a modern and spacious office space in the heart of Victoria Island, Lagos?
The office space features a sleek and modern design, complete with a conference room, high-speed internet, and parking for your convenience.
With two bathrooms and a sizeable 1500 square feet of space, this office is perfect for growing businesses or established companies looking for a new base.
Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to take your business to the next level.

name: Cozy Student Lodge
description: Affordable and cozy lodge for students.
Close to the university with easy access to amenities.

name: Commercial Shop Space
description: Are you a student looking for a comfortable and affordable place to call home?
The lodge features a range of amenities, including Wi-Fi, a study area, and laundry service, making it easy to balance your academic and social life.
With a sizeable 300 square feet of space, this lodge is ideal for individuals or sharing with friends.
Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to secure a comfortable and convenient place to live.
